name.name: Corpus Callosum Thickness Profile Analysis Pipeline

software.description: An end-to-end pipeline for corpus callosum processing that provides automated midsagittal alignment, CC segmentation with a quality control tool, and thickness profile generation. Groupwise analysis is facilitated by permutation testing with FWER and FDR multiple comparison correction. Results display is facilitated by a display script that shows p-values on a 3D pipe representation of a CC. This pipeline is implemented in Python.
